sub_title: LLM Public International Law and Legal Studies
summary:
With exceptional communication skills, I excel at breaking down intricate ideas into clear and concise explanations. 
I thrive in an international environment, embracing diverse nationalities and cultures. With a proactive approach and a strong sense of responsibility, I am skilled in both leadership and teamwork. I possess an analytical mindset, approaching challenges systematically and with intellectual curiosity. Seeking excellence through dedication, discipline, and a goal-oriented mindset.

courses.name: International Human Rights Law: Prospects and Challenges

profile_positions.description:
• Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders in export trade credit insurance industry. 
• Identify and pursue fresh avenues for business growth.
• Create marketing materials and presentations to effectively communicate the value of the company's services to potential clients, ensuring consistency with the company's brand and guidelines.
• Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and trends.
• Develop and maintain relationships with industry associations and other organizations to expand the company's reach and influence.
profile_positions.title: Director - QC and Business Development

profile_positions.description:
•	Led market research and designed the operational strategy for business development in Sub-Saharan Africa.
•	Established IA’s presence in the region by setting-up of local offices in Dakar, Ghana, Kenya, and South Africa. 
•	Assembled and coached a talented workforce, overseeing recruitment, training, and effective management of staff in both headquarters and local offices.
•	Optimized the operational and organizational aspects of investigation and recovery claims in the region, maximizing efficiency and outcomes.
•	Built a robust network of local lawyers and partners, facilitating operations and leveraging local expertise.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director - Africa

profile_positions.description:
•	Led the company's transition from the outdated SQL system to CRM. 
•	Collaborated with internal stakeholders to gather input and feedback on desired CRM functionalities and features.
•	Acted as the primary point of contact between the company and the service provider of SUGAR CRM.
•	Provided guidance and direction to the service provider regarding the specific needs and requirements, customization priorities and timelines.
•	Regularly communicated progress updates and project milestones to the company's management team.
•	Conducted thorough testing and quality assurance of the customized CRM solutions to ensure it meet the company's requirements.
•	Delivered in-person and virtual user training sessions to ensure proper adoption and utilization of the customized CRM system.
•	Designed engaging learning experiences and update existing content as needed.
•	Monitored and evaluated the performance and effectiveness of the customized CRM solution post-implementation.
profile_positions.title: Organizational Development & Training Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed investigation and recovery claims in Panama, Peru, and Venezuela, ensuring favorable outcomes for Credit Insurance Companies.
•	Conducted extensive research and provided expert advice on international trade regulations, empowering businesses to navigate complex legal requirements seamlessly.
•	Negotiated settlement agreements between parties in commercial transactions. 
•	Instructed external legal counsel, strategizing and overseeing arbitration and litigation proceedings for cases.
•	Built a robust network of local partners, facilitating efficient operations and leveraging local expertise.
•	Demonstrated exceptional stakeholder management skills, fostering strong relationships with key stakeholders in focus countries, resulting in enhanced collaboration and successful outcomes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.description:
• Acted as intermediary between buyers, creditors, and insurance companies, ensuring clear and timely communication to promote smooth claim investigation and recovery processes.
• Conducted comprehensive investigations into commercial transactions between buyers and creditors, providing insights into transaction dynamics and facilitating informed decision-making.
•  Tracked the whereabouts of goods ordered by buyers, employing investigative techniques to ensure transparency and accountability in transactions.
• Facilitated amicable debt collection efforts, utilizing effective communication and negotiation skills to foster positive resolutions.
•  Prepared demand letters and repayment agreements tailored to specific jurisdictions, ensuring compliance with local laws and regulations.
•  Monitored bankruptcy proceedings of buyers, staying vigilant to protect the interests of creditors and insurance companies throughout the process.
profile_positions.title: Associate

profile_positions.description:
•	Covered the side meetings to the Commission on the Status of Women (CSW59) and delivered the appropriate briefs and notes.
•	Fostered development and strengthening of relations with key member parliamentarians in Latin America to promote signing and ratification of the Arms Trade Treaty (ATT).
•	Drafted action newsletters within the framework of the Global Parliamentary Campaign to Prevent and Eliminate Child, Early and Forced Marriage.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
•	Provided strategic support to Program Officers through extensive legal research, comparative analysis and interpretation of different national and international legislations.
•	Prepared and updated contacts database, calendar of activities, as well as coordination of PGA’s social media, website and outreach tools.
•	Organized and coordinated meetings, conferences, events and seminars, including the respective follow-up tasks.
•	Liaised with PGA staff based in NY to ensure coordination of internal and external communications between offices. 
•	Drafted, reviewed and edited correspondence, reports, work plans, documents and publications, as well as public awareness and fundraising materials.
•	Prepared content for press releases and social media releases including website, twitter and Facebook.
profile_positions.title: Communications Intern

profile_positions.description:
•	Trained an average of 20 people a week on use of booking.com's extranet.
•	Coordinated training schedules, e-mail and telephone communication receiving and providing feedback.
•	Supported the execution of assigned activities and projects, processing and following-up on operational and administrative actions.
•	Provided timely and efficient administrative and IT support as well as other tasks as assigned.
profile_positions.title: Operations Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked in close collaboration with lawyers at all levels, clients and external partners. 
•	Maintained highly confidential information regarding clients and cases.
•	Assisted the maintenance of the Holding Structure for major agribusiness conglomerate in Venezuela, Latin America and The Caribbean.
•	Participated in the drafting of sale and acquisition contracts for several corporations.
•	Collaborated in the drafting of asset and share purchase agreements, whole sale financing agreements and guarantees for auto-financing companies in Venezuela.
profile_positions.title: Associate

profile_positions.description:
•	Reviewed court and administrative files regarding the expropriation of major agribusiness conglomerate in Venezuela.
•	Conducted legal research on exchange control issues and general corporate affairs.
•	Gathered inventory of relevant exchange control laws and translated their content to English for their further inclusion on quarterly reports.
•	Created and set into motion a paper recycling project for the firm.
profile_positions.title: Intern
